Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: bright red glowing light with a round shape with no other flashing lights, moving slow to medium speed
divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 8:45pm sat.night spotted a red to orangish light heading in straight line, we pulled of to the side of the road and watched it for about 7 min. And moved in straight line and then started hovering and changed directions about 90 degree turn and headed off and faded away into low level clouds.as we watched the object it gave us a weird feeling almost like a priminition feeling
trends: There has been one other sighting in candler
There were no other sightings in candler on or around December 24th 2011
